title: 1 bedroom with breakfast bar on 2nd floor!! Blocks away from Campbell!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Sofi at Los Gatos Creek has the Silicon Valley apartment you’ve been searching for.
Our studio, one, and two bedroom apartments for rent in San Jose, California, are your destination for quality and comfort.
With full appliance packages, covered parking, and bright, open floor plans, you’ll be glad you chose Sofi at Los Gatos Creek for your new home.
With two dazzling swimming pools, fitness centers, and a charming campus filled with lush greenery, this apartment community is built to make your daily routine just a little bit better.
Surrounded by old-growth trees and bathed in sunlight, these garden apartments are your perfect retreat after a long day of work or school.
Cats and Dogs Welcome up to 45 lbs.
Up to Two Pets per HomePet Deposit: $500 each Breed Restrictions Apply
Inquire with our leasing office for best rate available!
Please call our leasing office for more information
